basics.name: Deepak Shrestha
basics.summary: Computer Science graduate with a passion for innovative solutions in Computer Vision, Data Science, and Software Engineering.

work.name: Lamar University partnered with Texas A&M Agrilife Research
work.summary: Collaborated on a computer vision project for automated rice plant counting and rice plot segmentation. Developed a VGGNet-based CNN model, achieving 93% accuracy.

work.name: Parsedom
work.summary: Designed a data extraction framework using Python and NodeJS. Analyzed and visualized data for 50+ clients using pandas and seaborn.

work.name: Deerwalk Inc.
work.summary: Performed detailed analysis of Healthcare Effectiveness Data and Information Set (HEDIS) measures. Collaborated with clients on managing data intake.
highlights: Leveraged SQL for data analysis and mining

courses: Data Science and Big Data Analysis

projects.name: Automated Rice Seedling Counting
projects.description: Developed a deep learning model for precise rice seedling counting from drone imagery.

projects.name: Image-Based PM2.5 Pollution Analysis
projects.description: Developed an image-based method for PM2.5 concentration estimation using Matlab, Autoencoder, and Image Processing.

projects.name: Disaster Response Pipeline
projects.description: Developed a web application utilizing NLP techniques to classify emergency messages.
